text: Jon Kish Allegheny Township Jon Andrew Kish, 62, of Allegheny Township, passed away Thursday, January 22, 2026, at Allegheny General Hospital in Pittsburgh. A son of the late Paul J. Kish and Elizabeth I. (Mann) Kish, he was born December 11, 1963, in New Kensington, PA. Jon was a loving husband of 39 years, a wonderful father to two sons, and an adventurous pappy with four granddaughters. He was the rock of his family who could fix anything and would help anyone.
